_comment: This is sample AkariEngine configuration file.
session_secret: secret for encrypting sessions. This must NOT be exposed.

database._comment: This section is concerned with database connections. Database type can either be mariadb OR sqlite.

mariadb_options._comment: This section is only necessary if mariadb dialect is used.

sqlite_options._comment: This section is only necessary if sqlite dialect is used. DB file location MUST be relative to the parent directory of server.js.
